text: The Nationalist Socialist Council of Nagaland (NSCN) is a nationalist paramilitary group. It operates mainly in Northeast India, and sometimes in Myanmar. Its members are Christian Naga people. The main aim of the organization is to establish a sovereign state, "Nagalim". This would cover all areas inhabited by the Naga people. The NSCN has been declared as a terrorist organisation in India. ==References== Category:Separatist movements of India Category:Nationalist organizations in India Category:Christian organizations Category:Nagaland Category:Rebel militia groups in Asia Category:Christian terrorism Category:Organizations based in Myanmar
title: National Socialist Council of Nagaland
